metadata.title: Palais du Raja | Indian Restaurant in Tours | Traditional Cuisine
metadata.description: Traditional Indian and Pakistani restaurant in Tours. Discover authentic cuisine, spicy specialties and a warm atmosphere. Reservation at +33 2 47 64 81 55.

hero.subtitle: Traditional Indian and Pakistani restaurant in Tours

menu.title: Menu & Dishes
menu.description1: Dive into the captivating world of traditional Indian cuisine. At Palais du Raja, every dish tells a story, every spice reveals a secret passed down through generations.
menu.description2: Discover an exceptional palette of flavors: generous curries, fragrant tandooris, savory biryanis and fluffy naans.
menu.noDishes: No dishes available at the moment.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: Have a question, want to book a table or simply visit us? Get in touch or come and meet us at the restaurant.
